subject: Corruption (Institutional)
Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: The complex case, which involved cooperation between the I.R.S. and the F.B.I., is likely to lead to more charges related to corruption allegations at soccer’s highest levels.
snippet: The complex case, which involved cooperation between the I.R.S. and the F.B.I., is likely to lead to more charges related to corruption allegations at soccer’s highest levels.
